<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Dim the Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=781)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Darkness" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=39" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 236 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Shadow](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=14)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

**Trigger** You cast a [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) or [shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143) spell.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You magnify the darkness from the triggering effect, causing the ambient light level to flicker briefly so you can slip from sight. You can immediately attempt a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62), and you can become [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to a creature even if you don't have cover and aren't otherwise [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from that creature. You cease being hidden at the end of your turn unless you move into cover or become concealed before then.
name: Dim the Light
